name: Bren's Game
description:
Hey!

Bren's Game is a super easy and super fun platforming game where your only objective is to not fall into the water and get to the end of each level.

the game is currently in beta so this will mean that only the first world is available and progress made in the game will not be saved. the game is scheduled to release somewhere near early to mid-2022 and the price has not been determined yet.

no tutorial has been added to the game yet and will come in a later release.

when the end of the level is reached stand on the sign and jump in place to get to the next level.
